title: As AI enters operating rooms, reports highlight surgical errors and misidentified anatomy
description: AI-powered medical devices are linked to injuries, recalls, and lawsuits as regulators struggle to oversee a fast-growing wave of artificial intelligence in healthcare.
content: In 2021, a unit of healthcare giant Johnson & Johnson announced “a leap forward”: It had added artificial intelligence to a medical device used to treat chronic sinusitis, an inflammation of the sinuses. Acclarent said the software for its TruDi Navi... [15953 chars]

title: Russia will actively support BRICS agenda presented by Indian chair: Lavrov
description: Russia pledges full support for India's BRICS chairmanship. The agenda prioritizes counter-terrorism and energy security. India also focuses on ICT security and artificial intelligence. These initiatives aim to address global challenges and prepare for the future. Russia emphasizes reforms in international financial institutions. The country also clarifies its stance on the US dollar.
content:

title: AI-powered apps and bots enter healthcare, raising concerns among doctors
description: Doctors warn AI chatbots and medical apps can spread misinformation, fuel anxiety, and delay care as patients increasingly rely on artificial intelligence for health advice.
content:
Artificial intelligence is shaking up industries from software and law to entertainment and education. And as physicians like Dr. Cem Aksoy are learning, it’s posing special challenges in medicine as patients tap AI for advice.
Aksoy, a medical ​resi... [6895 chars]

title: AI chatbots give bad health advice: study
description: Despite now being able to ace most medical licensing exams, artificial intelligence chatbots do not give humans better health advice than they can find using more traditional methods, according to a study published on Monday.
content:
Next time you’re considering consulting Dr ChatGPT, perhaps think again.
Despite now being able to ace most medical licensing exams, artificial intelligence chatbots do not give humans better health advice than they can find using more traditional me... [2309 chars]

title: Three language policy panel submits report to Maharashtra CM, proposes AI and ICT education from Class 1
description: While the recommendations on the three-language formula have not been made public, the committee said it has also submitted a supplementary report proposing the introduction of Artificial Intelligence and Information and Communication Technology as subjects from Class 1 to Class 12 in schools.
content: Committee chairperson Narendra Jadhav said the submission included a brief presentation. Declining to disclose the contents of the recommendations, he said: “Now it has become the intellectual property of the CM and the government will bring it befor... [1199 chars]

title: Super Bowl ads want you to stop worrying and learn to love AI
description: If there was an overriding message throughout the Super Bowl ads last night, it’s that artificial intelligence is your friend.
content:
If there was an overriding message throughout the Super Bowl ads last night, it’s that artificial intelligence is your friend.

title: Stephen Moore to Newsmax: Trump's Dow 100K Call Is Possible
description: During an appearance on Newsmax's National Report, Moore said the call reflects confidence that the U.S. can continue dominating emerging technologies like artificial intelligence and robotics.
content: President Donald Trump's prediction that the Dow Jones Industrial Average could reach 100,000 by the end of his term is ambitious, economist Stephen Moore told Newsmax, but possible if the United States continues to lead the next wave of technologica... [3354 chars]

title: Using AI to tackle mule accounts to be in focus during two days conference by CBI, Centre
description: The use of artificial intelligence in tackling mule accounts, which form a key element in facilitating laundering of illicit funds stolen through cyber crimes, will be one of the focus areas of the two-day conference organised by the CBI and the Union Home Ministry's Indian Cyber Crime Coordination Centre (I4C) beginning Tuesday, officials said.

title: Megaworld to launch AI-powered homes enhancing modern living
description: ARTIFICIAL intelligence (AI) will soon personalize residential living with pioneering residential developments that are more intuitive, responsive and aligned with modern lifestyles. Giant property developer Megaworld will roll out later this year AI-powered homes in some of its selected properties, starting with Park McKinley West in Taguig City. Its partnership with global technology leader Samsung will integrate a comprehensive AI-powered ecosystem into next-generation homes.
